phys::UI::MenuWindow Class Reference

This class is an extended version of the window class for use exclusively with the menu widget. More...

#include <uimenuwindow.h>

Detailed Description

This class is an extended version of the window class for use exclusively with the menu widget.

Definition at line 93 of file uimenuwindow.cpp.

Button * phys::UI::MenuWindow::CreateBackButton ( const Vector2  Position,
const Vector2  Size 
) [virtual]

Creates a back button for this window.

The name is autogenerated to be the name of the window + "back". This function will do nothing if the back button has already been created.

Returns:
Returns a pointer to the created Back Button.
